snippet: Nathan Redmond struck twice and Manolo Gabbiadini scored a sixth goal in four games as Southampton edged Watford 4-3 in the Premier League at Vicarage Road on Saturday....

headline.main: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution
headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution

lead_paragraph: Nathan Redmond struck twice and Manolo Gabbiadini scored a sixth goal in four games as Southampton edged Watford 4-3 in the Premier League at Vicarage Road on Saturday.
